casebody.data:
Melissa TARDO, Danielle Tardo, Christopher Tardo and Joseph Tardo
v.
ALFORD SAFETY SERVICES, LLC and John Spears NO. 2019-CC-0142 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 22, 2019

Granted with a remand to the court of appeal for briefing and consideration of oral argument in accordance with La.C.C.P. art. 966(H).
